title: Add missing entries to the .gitignore file
description:
On 'ant idea' the following files show up as untracked files in git.

solr/contrib/dataimporthandler/test-lib/
solr/contrib/morphlines-core/test-lib/
solr/core/test-lib/
solr/example/start.jar 

I'm attaching a small patch to add the above the the .gitignore file

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
